'Prunella' is a genus of seven species of herbaceous plants in the family
Lamiaceae, also known as 'self-heals', 'heal-all', or 'allheal' for their use in
herbal medicine.
categories: Plants used in traditional Chinese medicine
Plants used in traditional Native American medicine
